page.title: 03LEISURE IN CUMNOCK
page.content:
Leisure available in Cumnock includes open air swimming pool, putting, tennis, picnic area, caravan area, all at the Woodroad Park.
The cinema shows films on Tuesday and Thursday and holds bingo on Monday, Wednesday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday.
There are pubs and clubs in Cumnock, e.g. working men's club, Cumnock Juniors, Mercat Inn, Craighead Inn and Dumfries Arms. Disco dances sometimes take place in the Town Hall. These provide lots of things to do.
Annual carnival time comes around and then the fair is here. There could be more leisure facilities available in Cumnock.
